parameters.name: IntegrationName
parameters.description: The name of the alert integration.

parameters.name: IntegrationProductType
parameters.description:
The type of the alert integration. Valid values:

*   CLOUD_MONITOR: CloudMonitor
*   LOG_SERVICE: Log Service

parameters.name: IsDetail
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to display the details of each alert integration:

*   true
*   false

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: Size
parameters.description: The number of alert integrations to return on each page.
